title: The Sweatbox-Long Play 20 feat. Kuma
descr:
>>Room: REN
Music: Tech House / Techno 
***Disclaimer: Please use REN's entrance for admission.

ADMISSION (Incl. 1 drink) : RM50

Kuma's long- awaited Long Play is happening this Saturday, December 22nd ! A pioneer on Malaysia's music scene and a true globetrotter, the DJ/Producer Kuma is a versatile artist and the almost 20 years of DJing are a true testament to his talent of keeping the crowds far and wide buzzing. His music tastes span from disco to techno and his predilection to afterparty sounds has made him one of the most sought after Malaysian DJs with Ibiza and Berlin as well as the notorious Jungle Experience party in Koh Phangan becoming now his favorite playgrounds when he is performing outside of his homeland. We look forward to his sound journey this Saturday at The Sweatbox ! Let's dance!

Kuma:
His name is no stranger to the electronic dance music scene in Malaysia. His signature sounds of underground House and Techno being his forte, together with a little more than 15 years of showcasing as a resident DJ for mega clubs in KL, either opening for guest artists or headlining himself ; earning him the Most Outstanding House Music DJ accolade in 2015 in his home ground, Kuala Lumpur. 

With an unshakeable monthly international gigs, touring around South East Asia and regular weekend gigs in his city, KUMA also juggles between having 2 of his own radio shows on Ibiza Radio 1 which is based in Ibiza, Spain and Frisky Radio broadcasts from New York where his sets are heard globally , weekly and monthly. 

https://soundcloud.com/kumamuzik

Book a table [email protected] or 
call +6012-9211730

Entry policy:
* Strictly 21 and above
* Only government-issued photo IDs accepted (originals not photocopies)
* No shorts, singlets or slippers allowed
* Management reserves the right to refuse entry

title: Kitty KO presents The Untitled One, Watashi and Nmakz
descr:
|| The Untitled One ||

The Untitled One is a Bangalore based Drum & Bass DJ, with an evolving musical taste within the underground bass music culture. Co-founding Drum and Bass India, a community that he, along with Ritu Arya, built to promote the Drum and Bass genre in the country & support homegrown artists and events.
Regularly playing at various venues across India, The Untitled One has also played at the official Vh1 Supersonic Festival 2017 After Party in Pune as well as Lakme India Fashion Week 2016 in Mumbai. He’s been called to shared the decks with & supported international acts like Netsky (Hospital Records), Delta Heavy (UK | RAM Records), Document One (UK | Technique Recordings), Sub Zero (UK | Playaz Recordings), Daddy G (UK | Massive Attack), Nerm (UK | Shiva Soundsystem), Goth Trad (JP | Deep Medi), B.R.E.E.D (LA, IN), Alo Wala (US, IN, DK | Enchufada) as well as Indian acts like Mosillator (IN | Generation Bass, Bheja Fry Records) etc.

https://soundcloud.com/TheUntitledOneOfficial
https://www.facebook.com/TheUntitledOneOfficial

|| Watashi ||

Watashi is a Bangalore based Drum n Bass producer and DJ. His move from Delhi to Bangalore, five years ago, to work as a sound engineer, exposed him to new genres of music and other talented musicians which has helped him to hone his unique sound. Taking inspiration from neurofunk artists like Mefjus, Noisia and Emperor, his style is aggressive with " In your face" bass, hard-hitting drums, and eerie experimental passages. Along with sharing the stage with artists from local DnB scene, his big break was opening for Netsky in 2018.

https://soundcloud.com/watashiwayogisan
https://www.facebook.com/watashiwayogisan/

|| Nmakz || 

https://soundcloud.com/nmakz
https://www.facebook.com/nmakz7/

Nmakz (Nikhil Maka) is a DJ from Bangalore and UK influenced, who is keen on educating the masses on the flavors of Drum & Bass from the 1990's through his diverse record collection. Expect an authentic and tearing selection of both new and old skool Dnb / Jungle. A special journey to be witnessed without doubt.
________________________________________
Free Drinks for ladies till 10pm.
1+1 on bar.

Date: 19th December 2018, Wednesday.
Venue: Kitty KO, The Lalit Ashok Hotel.
Club Rules Applied*
________________________________________
https://www.facebook.com/junketmgmt
https://www.instagram.com/junketmgmt

https://www.facebook.com/kittykobangalore
